Sunday.description: Church service at Chapel Hills Church (for those who are already in town)
Lunch at Del Taco (for those who are already in town)
Evening dinner and fellowship with host families (those whose host families aren't available, contact the Beeleys). Dinner time subject to change based on host family needs.

Monday.description: Morning worship, devotions, and prayer groups

Tuesday.description: Morning worship, devotions, and prayer groups
Free time to use indoor pool, play games, hang out, etc

Wednesday.description:
Free Day - No meals or structure provided
day subject to change based on weather

Thursday.description: Morning worship, devotions, and prayer groups
Picnic at Garden of the Gods

Friday.description: Morning worship, devotions, and prayer groups
Closing announcments, write thank yous, and fill out survey

Network user \"don't do\" list.description:
i. Do not download files in violation of copyright
ii. Do not access pornography or “near”-pornography
iii. Do not engage in any form of internet gambling
iv. Do not engage in any hacking/cracking activities, unless specifically authorized by LightSys
v. Do not engage in political activism – as a 501(c)(3) charity, we are not permitted to allow the use of our internet service (or other resources) for political activism
vi. Do not use BitTorrent. It can make the internet unusable for other team members
vii. Any personal use should be modest enough in nature to not disrupt the internet's availability for others
Please note that during Code-a-Thon, we'll be providing anonymized network traffic information to the groups working on the communications security projects. They will not be provided with the contents of the network traffic, with information identifying you, or with any actual URLs or web site names. By using the network, you agree to help our the security project teams in this way

Printers and Copiers.description: LightSys has an HP OfficeJet Pro 8600 (not Plus or Premium) color inkjet scanner/copier/printer. You can find it at IP 10.5.0.2, and in office #3. When setting it up for printing, use “direct TCP port” or “HP JetDirect” printing (port 9100).

Building Access.description:
i. If you open a door or window, please be sure to shut and lock it securely before you leave. We incur a fee for any false alarms in the burglar alarm system
ii. Ask permission before entering private offices that are not assigned to you

A reminder....description: We are blessed to be able to co-locate out of this office with Chapel Hills Church. Please do your part to help protect the good relationship we have with Chapel Hills Church by taking good care of the office and furniture, keeping the office neat and in presentable condition, and respecting our policies

In case of medical emergency.description:
Please call 911 from your phone
then call the Beeleys

If someone needs to urgently contact you.description:
Have them call you directly
call Lightsys during business hours
or call the Beeleys

Header.title: Things to do near Colorado Springs

body.option: America the Beautiful Park (Colorado Springs and Pikes Peak are what inspired the hymn "American the Beautiful")
Focus on the Family Visitor Center & Whit's End (Adventures in Odyssey)
U.S. Air Force Meseum at Peterson Air Force Base (requires advance reservations and security check)
U.S. Air Force Academy Visitor Center & Chapel
The ANA Money Meseum (free only on 3rd Saturdays)
Manitou Incline (Free: park at Old Man's Trail and ride the shuttle, $10: park at trailhead)
Pikes Peak Highway and Pikes Peak Cog Railway to the top of Pikes Peak (seasonal and weather permitting)

Royal Gorge Bridge-60+ miles away (free to observe from the rim, but $$ to walk on the bridge) 
Note: Passes include some ride. In the past they have also had a non-published "Bridge Only" pass that is cheaper, but only valid in the early morning when the rides aren't yet open
U.S. Olympic Training Center tour ($5 per person)
Outdoor recreation: snow skiing and tubing (winter), rock climbing, camping, white water rafting (summer), ice castle (some winters)
Escape Rooms: The Greatest Escape Games, Mystery-Quests.com Escape Rooms, Planet Deadline Escape Rooms, etc.
